headline: One Inc Launches Pre-Built Payment Integration for Verisk’s FAST Life Insurance Platform
summary: FOLSOM, Calif., June 18, 2025--One Inc, the leading digital payments network for the insurance industry, today announced the launch of a pre-built payment integration for Verisk’s FAST ("Flexible Architecture, Simplified Technology"), a modern, flexible platform designed to streamline and scale life insurance operations. This new integration connects One Inc’s industry-leading PremiumPay® for inbound payment capabilities directly into FAST’s configurable system architecture, helping carriers acc
